conbody.p: The HAL provides support for the initialization and maintenance of the CPUâ€™s memory management Translation Lookaside Buffer (TLB). For 32-bit TLBs, the memory management functions are supplied by including mips/m32tlb.h. For 64-bit TLBs found on either MIPS64 or MIPS32 with XPA support enabled, the functions are supplied by including mips/m64tlb.h.
Users should consult relevant Privileged Resource Architecture document and the Programmer's Guide for their processor when using the TLB as some aspects of TLB operation are implementation specific.
